turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Susan, I am really in the mood for some Starbucks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That does sound good. Would you need me to order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: lol - you know me too well. Yes, that would be great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location would you like to pick up from? The Carmel or Greenwood location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Greenwood would be great! Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will you be getting your usual Triple Mocha Frapac

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, not today. I think I am going to get something different.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I would like an Iced Caramel Machiato. That just sounds so good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It does. What would you like in that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an extra espresso shot in it and extra caramel. And Almond Milk instead of regular milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Let me go ahead and call them up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. I'll hold.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, let me repeat this back, you want an Iced Caramel Macchiato with extra caramel, an espresso shot and Almond milk instead of regular milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and I would like whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And whipped cream. lol Just a moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I have ordered for you an Iced Caramel Macchiato with extra caramel, an espresso shot, with Almond Milk and not regular milk and whipped cream on top, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct. Sounds wonderful.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They said it will be ready for pickup in about 15 mintues placing it at 10:30am roughly and you will be getting a text message with the receipt confirming the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just got the text. Okay, great. Sounds wonderful. Did you have any trouble using my account?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nope. They had all your information. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thanks! Great job. I'll talk to ya later!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. Bye!
